shortdesc.ph: Options for handling audio and video stream fallback when network conditions are poor.

plentry.pd: 0: No fallback processing is performed on audio and video streams, the quality of the audio and video streams cannot be guaranteed.
1: Only receive low-quality (low resolution, low bitrate) video stream.

(2): When the network conditions are poor, try to receive the low-quality video stream first. If the video cannot be displayed due to extremely poor network environment, then fallback to receiving audio-only stream.
